content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Production Line at (-28, -61)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position -28.0, -61.0)
- Stone furnace (position -27.0, -59.0)
- Burner inserter (position -25.5, -58.5)
- Wooden chest (position -24.5, -58.5) for collecting copper plates

### Iron Mining Complex at (-10, -59)
Consists of three mining drills with associated storage:
- Mining drill 1 (position -10.0, -59.0) with wooden chest (position -9.5, -57.5)
- Mining drill 2 (position -8.0, -59.0) with wooden chest (position -7.5, -57.5)
- Mining drill 3 (position -6.0, -59.0) with wooden chest (position -5.5, -57.5)
Note: All drills currently out of fuel

### Iron Smelting Line (0, 0)
Large smelting setup consisting of:
- 4 Stone furnaces at positions (0.0, 0.0), (2.0, 0.0), (4.0, 0.0), (6.0, 0.0)
- 4 Input burner inserters at positions (0.5, -1.5), (2.5, -1.5), (4.5, -1.5), (6.5, -1.5)
- 4 Output burner inserters at positions (0.5, 1.5), (2.5, 1.5), (4.5, 1.5), (6.5, 1.5)
- 4 Input wooden chests for coal at positions (0.5, -2.5), (2.5, -2.5), (4.5, -2.5), (6.5, -2.5)
- 4 Output wooden chests for iron plates at positions (0.5, 2.5), (2.5, 2.5), (4.5, 2.5), (6.5, 2.5)

ERROR TIPS

### Entity Placement Errors
- When placing inserters next to entities, ensure there is enough space and no collision with existing entities
- Check if the target position is valid (not water or other unsuitable terrain)
- Consider adjusting the spacing parameter when placing entities next to each other

### Entity Pickup Errors
- Verify the entity exists at the specified position before attempting to pick it up
- Double check coordinates when trying to pick up entities

### Resource Management
- Mining drills are out of fuel - implement a fuel management system
- Furnaces have no ingredients - ensure proper supply chain of materials

### Entity Status Monitoring
- Multiple inserters are in "waiting for source items" status - ensure proper material flow
- Mining drill outputs are blocked - ensure proper output collection setup
